Chat with us anonymously using the Ricoc: Chat with us anonymously using the Ricochet application
To chat with us use the following Ricoch: To chat with us use the following Ricochet address:
By using the Tor network and creating an: By using the Tor network and creating an Onion Service, Ricochet is an instant messaging app that allows you to chat while protecting your privacy and staying anonymous by not revealing your location or IP address. You won't notice any difference from an insecure chat, except that you will be using a unique address instead of a phone number/email/username.

Make it possible for this admin to reset: Make it possible for this admin to reset user passwords.
We advise selecting this option if you w: We advise selecting this option if you would like to protect data from being lost in the situation where recipients lose their passwords. On the other hand, we would not advise using this feature if you want to setup a system where only recipients are able to access submissions.

You're receiving this email because a us: You're receiving this email because a user account has been created for you on the system: {Site}
Please click on the activation link to p: Please click on the activation link to proceed with the account activation and to set your user password.

Your whistleblowing platform is now acce: Din fløyteblåserplattform er nå tilgjengelig på:
The platform will be automatically delet: Plattformen vil bli slettet automatisk den:
The number of activities recently detect: Antallet nylige aktiviteter later til å være høyere enn normalt.
This could be a sign of an attack (for e: Dette kan indikere angrep (eksempelvis at noen oversvømmer tjeneren med ugyldig informasjon) eller bare en brå økning i aktivitetsnivået på grunn av naturlige årsaker(, som synligheten til ditt prosjekt).
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Undersøk problemet for å bestemme hvorvidt det er legitimt eller skadelig.
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: The server cannot guarantee that a new report can be stored, so submissions have been disabled.
Please consider asking your technical su: Overvei å spørre din tekniske brukerstøtte om å frigjøre eller legge til mer diskplass på tjeneren.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: Globaleaks-teknologi innheholder en komponent som sjekker statusen til tjeneren, denne vil holde deg underrettet om noe skulle behøve din oppmerksomhet.
For more information, log in to the Admi: Ytterligere informasjon tilgjengelig ved innlogging på administrasjonspanelet under seksjonene "Systemstatistikk" og "Unormalheter".
This is an email to inform you that the: Denne e-postens hensikt er å informere deg om at PGP-nøkkelen til følgende brukere allerede er eller kommer til å utløpe:
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Uten en gyldig PGP-nøkkel, vil systemet ikke kunne sende dem krypterte merknader.

Logg inn for å løse problemet.

It is good security practice to keep the: Det er god sikkerhetspraksis å holde plattformen oppdatert.
To learn about new features and bug fixe: For å lære mer om nye funksjoner og feilrettinger i den nye versjonen, henvend dem til endringsloggen på: {ChangeLogUrl}
For instructions on software updates, pl: For instruks om programvareoppdateringer, henvend dem til dokumentasjonen på: {UpdateGuideUrl}
Please remember to check them before the: Husk å sjekke dem før de blir slettet.
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.
You are asked to pay special attention t: You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.
This is an email to notify that an exist: This is an email to notify that an existing report has been updated.
This email is to remind you the presence: This email is to remind you the presence of unread or updated reports.
